summary: A mod that adds a power that allows you to view spell and magic effect values.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://oi46.tinypic.com/2u5qb9e.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=7][b][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]REQUIRES SKSE[/url][/b][/size][/center]

[img]http://oi46.tinypic.com/2l3jtk.jpg[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24745]Phenderix Ultimate Magic System[/url] a magic system with over 50 new spells, elemental bending, and a new resource system.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25794]Phenderix Tool - Edit Weapon:[/url] allows the user to edit weapon values and enchanments.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25961]Phenderix Tool - Spell Stats:[/url] A mod that adds a power that allows you to view spell and magic effect values.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25937]Phenderix Tool - Teleports:[/url] allows the user to teleport to many locations.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5898]Phenderix's Magic Evolved[/url] a magic mod that adds over 200 spells! Recently optimized.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12716]Phenderix's Magic Sounds Improved[/url] makes some of the magic sounds a little less annoying.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22937]Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry[/url] a mod that adds over 200 spells and 100+ npcs along with many areas to explore.
author: phenderix
